text: Transcription element search system analysis of the human <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter predicted 3 putative RUNX binding sites at 333 , 287 , and 53 bp upstream of the transcription start site ( TSS ) .
All three binding sites are conserved between human , mouse , and rat ( Fig.S4 ) .

To verify the putative binding sites in the <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter , we transiently transfected HEK293T cells with <extra_id_0> RUNX1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> RUNX3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
